    1: """Errors."""
    2: 
    3: from __future__ import annotations
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class ProcessCallFailedError(RuntimeError):
    7:     """Failed a process call."""
    8: 
    9:     def __init__(self, code, out, err, cmd) -> None:
   10:         super().__init__(code, out, err, cmd)
   11:         self.code = code
   12:         self.out = out
   13:         self.err = err
   14:         self.cmd = cmd
